string.name: hint_body
string.i: quote / saying / passage / speech / writing / verse / poem / lyrics / conversation / ...

resources.string: You have no quotes in your collection.
No quotes in your collection match the current filter setting. Set a less constraining filter or switch it off.
No quotes in your trash match the current filter setting. Set a less constraining filter or switch it off.
Are you sure you want to move this quote to trash?
Are you sure you want to move selected quotes to trash?
Are you sure you want to discard changes?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete selected tag
An error occured while editing the image
There was a problem initializing Text Recognizer
Are you sure you want to discard captured text?
Your device does not support importing quotes using microphone
Are you sure you want to restore selected quotes?
Are you sure you want to restore this quote?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete selected quotes?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this quote?
There was a problem loading the application
Add quotes to your collection from a file
Save the content of your database into a file
Welcome to Phiquo, your personal quote collector!
This tutorial will introduce you to the main app features. You can also skip it and reactivate it at any time in app settings.
Quote list is the home screen of the app. Click on any quote to view its entire content.
Set up a filter to show only a subset of your quote collection. Filter panel can be pulled down from under the top bar.
Click the Phiquo button to display a random quote from your entire collection or from a filtered subset.
Long-pressing a quote on the list activates action mode that lets you select one or more quotes and perform actions on them.
Throughout the app, long-pressing a button displays the tooltip.
Place the Phiquo widget on your device home screen. By default, it will display random quotes from your collection, but you may also lock it to keep displaying a particular quote.
When adding a new quote or editing an existing one, you can extract text from pictures or voice recordings.
You can add additional authors, for example, if you would like to store a conversation.
Organize your collection by creating tags and applying them to your quotes.
By long-pressing a tag, you can edit or delete it.
In gallery, view complete content of your quotes on a one-by-one basis. Filter settings from quote list apply also in gallery.
Navigate the gallery by swiping left and right or jump to a random quote with the Phiquo button.
Gallery appearance can be customized in settings. For example, you can change the background and choose which quote metadata is displayed.
Deleted quotes are moved to trash. Here you can restore them or permanently delete them from your app.
